Label: Consent Control
Definition: The control or activity associated with obtaining, providing, withdrawing, or reaffirming consent

Label: Obtain Consent
Usage: Indicates how the controller or entity can obtain consent e.g. used with dpv:isExercisedAt

Label: Provide Consent
Usage: Indicates how the data subject can provide consent e.g. used with dpv:isExercisedAt

Label: Withdraw Consent
Usage: Indicates how the data subject can withdraw consent e.g. used with dpv:isExercisedAt

Label: Reaffirm Consent
Usage: Indicates how the controller (with dpv:ObtainConsent) or data subject (with dpv:ProvideConsent) can reaffirm consent e.g. used with dpv:isExercisedAt

Label: Refuse Consent
Usage: Indicates how the controller (with dpv:ObtainConsent) or data subject (with dpv:ProvideConsent) can reaffirm consent e.g. used with dpv:isExercisedAt

Label: Manage Consent
Definition: Control for managing a given consent in terms of providing, reaffirming, or withdrawing it
Usage: Indicates how the data subject can manage their consent in terms of providing it, or reaffirming or withdrawing a given consent. This concept is useful to represent a single location or interface where multiple controls are provided for consent
